description: Datetime that first tweet was sent
Datetime that final tweet was sent
Count of tweets included in the interaction
The number of times the tweet author changed during the responses (e.g. when the reply is a different author than the prior tweet, the count of turns increments by 1)

The text of the interaction - follows the format of  
author: tweet (line break) 
author: tweet
A boolean of whether the tweet is resolved, per human annotation
